control_attributes.Control: SC-21 SECURE NAME / ADDRESS RESOLUTION SERVICE (RECURSIVE OR CACHING RESOLVER)
control_attributes.control_description: The information system requests and performs data origin authentication and data integrity verification on the name/address resolution responses the system receives from authoritative sources.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization employs automated mechanisms to support the management of information system accounts.
